heroSection.title: Light Academy College of Engineering
heroSection.description: Join us at L.A.C.E., where innovation meets inspiration. Dive into cutting-edge engineering programs and be part of a future-focused community dedicated to excellence and sustainability.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.description: Light Academy College of Engineering (L.A.C.E.) is an institution dedicated to advancing knowledge and innovation in the fields of engineering and technology. Located in the heart of a vibrant urban center, L.A.C.E. offers a dynamic learning environment that combines modern facilities, research, and a commitment to sustainability and environmental stewardship.

programs.name: Software Engineering
programs.description: Our Software Engineering program equips students with the skills needed to design, develop, and maintain software systems. From front-end development to back-end infrastructure, students learn the latest technologies and best practices.

programs.name: Cybersecurity
programs.description: In the Cybersecurity program, students learn to protect digital assets from cyber threats. With hands-on training in ethical hacking, network security, and cryptography, graduates are prepared for careers in information security.

programs.name: IT & Entrepreneurship
programs.description: The IT & Entrepreneurship program combines technical skills with business acumen. Students learn to leverage technology for innovation and entrepreneurship, with courses in business analytics, project management, and digital marketing.

programs.name: STEM Pedagogy
programs.description: Our STEM Pedagogy program trains educators in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. Through curriculum development and instructional design, graduates inspire the next generation of STEM professionals.

cta.title: Ready to Apply?
cta.description: Take the next step towards your future at our College of Engineering. Contact us today to learn more about our programs and admission process.

data.title: Affordable Education in English
data.description: Our College of Engineering offers lower tuition rates compared to four-year universities, making education more accessible and reducing student debt. Access to the licensed tailored curriculums, courses & specialization tracks of Coursera.org and personal laptop which student gets upon admission.

data.title: Small Class Sizes
data.description: Smaller class sizes at our college allow for more personalized attention from instructors, fostering a better learning environment and stronger student-teacher relationships. 40 students per cohort.

data.title: Focused Programs
data.description: Our College of Engineering offers focused, career-oriented programs that are designed to meet the needs of the local and global job market, ensuring that students gain relevant skills for immediate employment. Our College of Engineering offers four programs: Software Engineering, Cyber Security, IT & Entrepreneurship, STEAM Pedagogy.

data.title: Hands-On Learning
data.description: College of Engineering emphasizes practical, hands-on learning experiences in their engineering programs, providing students with valuable real-world skills. Each curriculum supports multiple tracks of specialization.

data.title: Flexible Scheduling
data.description: With options for part-time, self-study session and online classes, our college offers flexible scheduling to accommodate working students or those with other commitments.

data.title: Transfer Opportunities
data.description: Our college has articulation agreements with four-year universities, making it easier for students to transfer credits and continue their education at a bachelor’s level.

data.title: Industry Connections
data.description: Our college has strong ties with local and international industries and businesses, providing students with networking opportunities, internships, and job placement assistance.

data.title: Supportive Environment
data.description: Our LA College of Engineering offers a supportive and inclusive environment with resources such as tutoring, counseling, and career services to help students succeed.

data.title: Community Engagement
data.description: Being smaller and more localized, our LA College of Engineering encourages students to engage with the community through service learning, local/global contests, hackathons, projects, and collaborations, enhancing both personal and professional development.

data.title: Diverse Student Body
data.description: The diverse student population at our college enriches the learning experience by bringing a variety of perspectives and backgrounds to the classroom.

questions.question: How long does the program last for students who have completed 9th grade?
What is the language of instruction?
questions.answer: The language of instruction is English. The 1st-year program for 10th and 11th grades will be conducted in the language in which the school instruction was conducted. The 2nd and 3rd-year instruction will be entirely in English.

questions.question: Can I know the tuition fees?
questions.answer: The initial payment is 30% of the total fee. Detailed information on the cost is available upon contacting the admissions office. Please call: 0501 990 550, 0755 990 550

questions.question: Will the contract price change?
questions.answer: No, the contract price at the time of enrollment will not change for all 3 years.

questions.question: Can I work with the diploma after graduating from your college?
questions.answer: After graduation, you can work with a diploma of secondary technical education, or continue your studies at a university.

questions.question: What are the criteria for placing students abroad, in Japan and Germany?
questions.answer: A minimum level of B1 in German or Japanese and an academic performance of over 85 out of 100 are required.

questions.question: What type of diploma will I receive after graduating from the college?
questions.answer: After graduation, a diploma of secondary technical education of the Kyrgyz Republic standard will be issued.

questions.question: What is included in the contract?
questions.answer: In addition to education, the college provides a new, individual laptop to each admitted student.

questions.question: Does the contract amount include accommodation and meals?
questions.answer: No, our education does not include accommodation and meals.

questions.question: What is the contract price if I have my own laptop?
questions.answer: The contract is $2200 with your own laptop

questions.question: My English is not good enough. How can I study at your college?
questions.answer: If your English level does not meet our minimum requirement, students can enroll in a preparatory course. If you have only completed the 9th grade, you will study both English and the 10th-11th grade program in the first year.

questions.question: Can I know the class schedule?
questions.answer: The class schedule is from 09.00 to 17.00

requirements.title: Admission Requirements
requirements.description: To be eligible for admission, you must meet the following criteria:
list: Successful completion of 9th or 11th grade
Preparation of required documents (diploma, passport, etc.)
No entrance exams required

cost.title: Cost of Education
cost.description: The initial payment is $1200. For detailed information about the cost, please contact the admissions office.

documents.title: Documents Required for Admission
list: Copy of passport (or birth certificate)
Original state-issued certificate of completion of 9th grade
4 photos (3x4 cm)
Copies of parents' passports
Medical certificate (form 086/U)
Copy of military ID or registration certificate (for males over 18)

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.phone: For more information, please contact us at: 0501 990 550 or 0755 990 550

contactSection.description: Feel free to contact us? Submit your message here and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactSection.name: Name

about.title: Light Academy
about.description: Light Academy (L.A.) is an educational brand which started its path in 2018 and at the moment operates 5 international schools in different regions of Kyrgyzstan. This year L.A. is opening new engineering college in Bishkek L.A. College of Engineering.
about.overviewDescription: Light Academy College of Engineering (L.A.C.E.) is an institution dedicated to advancing knowledge and innovation in the fields of engineering and technology. Located in the heart of a vibrant urban center, L.A.C.E. offers a dynamic learning environment that combines modern facilities, research, and a commitment to sustainability and environmental stewardship.
about.missionDescription: Our mission is to educate and inspire the next generation of engineers and technologists to solve industries pressing challenges through innovation, ethical practice, and a deep understanding of global environmental issues.
about.visionDescription: At Light Academy College of Engineering (LACE), we envision becoming a leading institution recognized globally for excellence in engineering education and research. Our commitment is to empower students through innovative learning experiences and cutting-edge research, fostering leaders who are prepared to solve the world's most pressing technological challenges. We aim to cultivate an environment where creativity, diversity, and collaboration are the cornerstones of advancing knowledge and driving sustainable progress in society.

softwareEngineering.name: Software Engineering
softwareEngineering.description: The Software Engineering Program is dedicated to advancing the discipline of software development through comprehensive educational programs, research, and collaboration with industry. Focused on the application of engineering principles to the design, development, and implementation of software, the program offers both theoretical and practical training. Students learn about various software development methodologies, project management, and effective team collaboration, preparing them to tackle complex software challenges in a dynamic technological landscape.

cyberSecurity.name: Cyber Security
cyberSecurity.description: The Cybersecurity Program provides rigorous training and research opportunities in the field of information security. Addressing the increasing threats in the digital world, the program's curriculum covers areas such as network security, ethical hacking, cryptography, and data protection. Through hands-on labs and real-world projects, students are equipped with the skills needed to design, implement, and manage secure systems and to anticipate and mitigate potential security breaches, thus preparing them for high-demand roles in both public and private sectors.

itEntrepreneurship.name: IT & Entrepreneurship
itEntrepreneurship.description: The IT & Entrepreneurship Program bridges the gap between advanced technological skills and innovative business strategies. This program focuses on leveraging technology for business growth, covering topics such as digital transformation, tech startups, and venture capital. It encourages students to develop entrepreneurial thinking alongside strong IT skills, fostering the creation of new ventures and innovations in the tech industry. The curriculum is designed to empower students to launch and manage technology-driven businesses effectively.

stemPedagogy.name: STEM Pedagogy
stemPedagogy.description: The STEM Pedagogy program focuses on the education and training of future educators in the fields of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. This program emphasizes the development of effective teaching strategies, curriculum design, and the integration of technology into education. By combining educational theory with practical teaching experiences, the program aims to prepare educators who can inspire and engage the next generation of scientists and engineers, enhancing the overall quality of STEM education.

academics.reasonsTitle: Ten Reasons to Study at LA College of Engineering

reasons.description: Our College of Engineering offers lower tuition rates compared to four-year universities, making education more accessible and reducing student debt. Access to the licensed tailored curriculums, courses & specialization tracks of Coursera.org and personal laptop which student gets upon admission.
Smaller class sizes at our college allow for more personalized attention from instructors, fostering a better learning environment and stronger student-teacher relationships. 40 students per cohort.

College of Engineering emphasizes practical, hands-on learning experiences in their engineering programs, providing students with valuable real-world skills. Each curriculum supports multiple tracks of specialization.

description.text: Our College of Engineering offers focused, career-oriented programs that are designed to meet the needs of the local and global job market, ensuring that students gain relevant skills for immediate employment. Our College of Engineering offers four programs: Software Engineering, Cyber Security, IT & Entrepreneurship, STEAM Pedagogy.
list: Software Engineering: Front-end, Back-end, Full-stack, Mobile App development.
Cybersecurity: Security Engineering, DevOps, DevSecOps.
IT & Entrepreneurship: Business Analytics and Data Science, Project Management, Digital Marketing.
STEAM Pedagogy: Informatics, Physics, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics.

reasons.description: With options for part-time, self-study session and online classes, our college offers flexible scheduling to accommodate working students or those with other commitments.
Our college has articulation agreements with four-year universities, making it easier for students to transfer credits and continue their education at a bachelor’s level.

description.text: Our college has strong ties with local and international industries and businesses, providing students with networking opportunities, internships, and job placement assistance.
list: Students will be offered to take one of two elective courses beside English: German or Japanese. Upon successful mastery of B1-level language proficiency in one of the languages and GPA sufficiency we guarantee job positions in Germany or Japan respectively

reasons.description: Our LA College of Engineering offers a supportive and inclusive environment with resources such as tutoring, counseling, and career services to help students succeed.
The diverse student population at our college enriches the learning experience by bringing a variety of perspectives and backgrounds to the classroom.

Being smaller and more localized, our LA College of Engineering encourages students to engage with the community through service learning, local/global contests, hackathons, projects, and collaborations, enhancing both personal and professional development. Studying at a College of Engineering can provide a strong foundation in engineering principles while offering numerous advantages that cater to diverse needs and goals.

requirements.title: Admission Requirements
requirements.description: To apply for our programs, you need to meet the following requirements:
list: Successful completion of 9th or 11th grade.
Preparation of necessary documents (certificate, passport, etc.).
No entrance exams required.

cost.title: Tuition Fees
cost.description: Initial fee: $1200. Detailed information about tuition fees is available at the admissions office.

documents.title: Required Documents
list: Copy of passport (or birth certificate).
Original state-issued certificate of completion of 9th grade.
Four 3/4 photos.
Copies of parents' passports.
Medical certificate 086/U.
Copy of military registration certificate or military ID (for males over 18).

graduationDocuments.title: Graduation Documents
list: Diploma of secondary vocational education: The main document confirming the receipt of secondary vocational education in a specific specialty. It can be with honors (red diploma) or without honors (blue diploma), depending on the student's performance.
Diploma supplement: This document lists all the subjects the student studied and the grades received. The supplement is an integral part of the diploma.

Certificates: Depending on the training program and additional courses, the student may receive various certificates. These may include certificates for completing advanced training courses or certificates of specific professional skills.
